## cilium bpf dropmetrics

List drop metrics for various endpoints

### Synopsis


List drop metrics for various endpoints

```
cilium bpf dropmetrics endpoint list
```

### Options

```
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
